= Minio
:cq-artifact-id: camel-quarkus-minio
:cq-native-supported: true

[.badges]
[.badge-key]##JVM since##[.badge-supported]##1.5.0## [.badge-key]##Native since##[.badge-supported]##1.6.0##

Store and retrieve objects from Minio Storage Service using Minio SDK.

== What's inside

* xref:latest@components::minio-component.adoc[Minio component], URI syntax: `minio:bucketName`

Please refer to the above link for usage and configuration details.

== Maven coordinates

[source,xml]
----
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-minio</artifactId>
</dependency>
----

Check the xref:user-guide/index.adoc[User guide] for more information about writing Camel Quarkus applications.

== SSL in native mode

This extension auto-enables SSL support in native mode. Hence you do not need to add
`quarkus.ssl.native=true` to your `application.properties` yourself. See also
https://quarkus.io/guides/native-and-ssl[Quarkus SSL guide].
